about_the_game:
Paragonian 3: The Warrior of Light is an ARPG that plays alone. Explore the Oriental World!
Paragonian 3: Kwang, the light warrior is a 3D ARPG game. Eliminate enemies to raise levels and use a variety of weapons.
Enjoy the story of the game and watch a variety of cinematic videos. Explore the oriental world and enjoy the game!

Game Stroy
A light warrior who succeeded in escaping from the Paragonian experiment.
On his way back home, he meets Raizin, the god of thunder, and starts an inevitable battle.
Gwang fights the battle between Laijin, but eventually falls off the cliff.
While taking a walk, Hwangryong Village's chief finds Gwang who fainted under a cliff and rescues him.
After waking up, Gwang realizes that he has lost his Inner Qi , and with the help of Hwangryongchon Village, he begins to recover.
You have to play him and recover Inner Qi and solve Hwangryongchon's request.

Cherish Life
Once you've entered the game, you'll invest your time to recover your Inner Qi.
Upgrade your equipment with the money you earned while restoring your Inner Qi and prepare thoroughly.
If you get to the Main Story and die, the game will end, so you have to be fully prepared.

name: Paragonian 3 : The Warrior of Light

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 10 64 Bit, Windows 8.1 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 Bit, Windows 7 64 Bit Service Pack 1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad CPU Q6600 @ 2.40GHz (4 CPUs) / AMD Phenom 9850 Quad-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GT 1GB / AMD HD 4870 1GB (DX 10, 10.1, 11)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Paragonian 3: The Warrior of Light is an ARPG that plays alone. Explore the Oriental World! Gwang, who lost his mind in the fight against Laijin, the god of lightning, is rescued by the chief of the village. He will lose Inner Qi in the fight against Laijin and must regain his strength.
